EmailTemplate.description: Trigger notification to partner 3 months after opportunity is labelled "Not ready to buy - follow-up in 3 months
EmailTemplate.name: follow-up with OPPORTUNITY NAME
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder to follow-up with OPPORTUNITY NAME
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
It has been 3 months since you last had contact with OPPORTUNITY NAME {!Opportunity.Name__c}. This is a friendly reminder to follow-up with this prospect to see if they are ready to make a decision on going solar. Please update this opportunity record once you have re-established contact. You can set another 3-month reminder by re-selecting “Not ready to buy follow up in 3 months” from the Reason Won/Lost field".
Thank you. SunPower Customer Care
